response.raw:
Here is my attempt at the task:

Supporting Development of Training Materials and Technical Manuals

1. Gather source material - Collect existing documentation, subject matter expert input, and other relevant content - Organize content and identify gaps that need to be filled 2. Create content outlines - Break material into major topics and subtopics - Develop a logical flow and hierarchy for the content - Get outlines reviewed and approved by stakeholders 3. Write the content - Draft the training material or technical manual sections - Explain concepts clearly using plain language - Use examples, diagrams, and other visual aids as appropriate - Ensure consistency in style, terminology and formatting 4. Review and revise - Have subject matter experts review content for technical accuracy - Edit and proofread content for clarity, grammar, and adherence to style guide - Make revisions based on feedback 5. Format and publish - Format content attractively for print or online delivery - Publish or deploy finished training materials or manuals - Make content available to target audience
